answers.answer: You have been through a lot.  If it were just anxiety, then I would think you would get relief from a drug in the same class as Valium.  If the anxiety is causing severe constipation, then MiraLax could get your digestion back on track.  Believe me, constipation can make one very sick, and once you are used to being that way, it is very hard to detect what's going on.For my anxiety I found relaxation therapy with biofeedback very helpful.  Also a low dose of nortriptyline or amitriptyline might help even you out, but they are constipating.  Have they tested you for STDs and PID?  What about your gallbladder function?  (HIDA scan).
